title: Meddler, please don't make the trinket upgrade free.
body:
If people are stupid enough not to buy upgraded map hacks for 250g, let natural selection do its thing.

Real talk.

replies.body: If people who aren't playing support are stupid enough to buy trinket upgrades over full build, let natural selection do its thing.

> [{quoted}](name=NERDSMASHER5000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9fbWjKOi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-18T16:33:04.548+0000)

> If people who aren't playing support are stupid enough to buy trinket upgrades over full build, let natural selection do its thing.

Im sure if you can get full build you can fucking spend 250 on an unlimited ward -__-

If you're behind, don't cripple yourself even harder by wasting 250 on non-defensive/core items. You already have a trinket that does its job fine. **Use it.**

Upgraded trinket is a noob trap legit.

probably because you aren't upgrading your trinkets enough IMO

Probably because I don't play Ranked and the few games I did I played Support.

Elo doesn't always indicate your skill, some people like me just play the first 10 games to get it over with, some don't play Ranked period, and there's a billion other issues like Trolls, Ragers, Flamers, AFK'ers (all of which I saw almost every game  I did play Ranked) that currently destroy Ranked, specifically during the Summer.

How is upgrading your trinket not a good idea? It's roughly 12 minions for double the vision you can use. Vision to keep yourself from getting caught out, securing objective control, offensive wards, defensive wards. If you don't upgrade the trinket, you're going to waste a lot of gold just on wards considering they cost 75g per, meaning you'll be only able to buy **less than 4 wards** with 250g, when you could of gotten much more almost for free.

The value of the upgraded trinket doesn't make up for It's cost immediately, however as the game goes on you can end up saving hundreds of gold.

You talked about trying to get full build before upgrading the trinket, yet you kind of contradicted yourself considering if you don't ugrade the trinket, then you'll hinder your build on buying unnecessary wards when you could of got them for free.

{{item:3362}} is secretly the strongest item in the game.

I just did lol.
I don't even understand why you guys pay him so much attention. Obvious troll is obvious...

Well Looking at your match history it seems that every time you end up going to top lane the enemy jungler/team is demolishing your ass because either you don't ward your lane or your ward(trinket) expires before you can place down another one. You can say that upgraded trinkets are useless, in actuality spending 250g to prevent your ass from falling further behind from being camped or keep a lead when you are ahead is worth the investment and after 3 wards placed (greater stealth totem) or 2 pinks (greater vision totem) you are just generating free gold with the trinket

the upgraded green trinket is by and far the BEST out there. 

If there was a sweeper item isntead of trinket, i can almost gurantee that supports would use trinkets and the sweeper item instead of sightstone and sweeper trinket.
Very true. The lack of a Hextech Sweeper (the ARAM version, not the trinket) on SR is the only reason that supports buy Sightstone at all now.

> [{quoted}](name=A Miss Fortune,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9fbWjKOi,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000000200000000,timestamp=2015-07-18T18:08:33.244+0000)
>
> It's roughly 12 minions for **6 times** the vision you can use.

Ftfy

1 ward per 2 min that lasts 1 min -> 1 min vision per 2 min. 

2 wards per 2 min that last 3 min -> 6 min vision per 2 min
You must not be familiar with this chap, he is a professional troll (and quite a good (bad?) one too).

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9fbWjKOi,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-07-18T17:57:36.694+0000)
>
> You must not be familiar with this chap, he is a professional troll (and quite a good one too).

you think hes trolling, then you realize hes plat 4 and he never upgrades his trinket. His logic is sound. Ill sop upgrading my trink bc this guy knows its a waste and have shown me as such

He isn't being that logical though. Vision does win games (I've had so many games that were neck and neck and we won because I got my team to ward and we were able to get picks and finish, or stay safe and out splitpush). Also, 95% of matches I play the team that wins (mine or the enemy's) is the team with more wards, usually by a ratio of about 3/2 for the winning team, sometimes more (the bigger the difference, almost always the shorter the match). also, upgrading your trinket allows you to have 100% uptime on all 3 wards you can place, where un upgraded you get 33.33% uptime on a single ward, or 1/9th the total vision on the map. Once you hit level 9, it gets a little better at 100% uptime on one ward, leaving you at 1/3rd the total vision you could have, but that is still a very big handicap. Getting 3 times the vision for only 250 gold is just too good to pass up, especially considering that it pays for itself after using only 5 charges, at which point it is effectively generating 12.5 gp10 for you (~8 gp10 more than a non upgraded level 9+ ward trinket).

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9fbWjKOi,comment-id=00000000000100000001,timestamp=2015-07-18T19:14:03.532+0000)
>
> He isn't being that logical though. Vision does win games (I've had so many games that were neck and neck and we won because I got my team to ward and we were able to get picks and finish, or stay safe and out splitpush). Also, 95% of matches I play the team that wins (mine or the enemy's) is the team with more wards, usually by a ratio of about 3/2 for the winning team, sometimes more (the bigger the difference, almost always the shorter the match). also, upgrading your trinket allows you to have 100% uptime on all 3 wards you can place, where un upgraded you get 33.33% uptime on a single ward, or 1/9th the total vision on the map. Once you hit level 9, it gets a little better at 100% uptime on one ward, leaving you at 1/3rd the total vision you could have, but that is still a very big handicap. Getting 3 times the vision for only 250 gold is just too good to pass up, especially considering that it pays for itself after using only 5 charges, at which point it is effectively generating 12.5 gp10 for you (~8 gp10 more than a non upgraded level 9+ ward trinket).

man these are some ~~dubious~~ great statistics and research you're dropping is this actually Lyte's smurf?

no, these statistics are called any average joe being able to use a calculator.

before level 9, a warding trinket gives you one ward every 180 seconds that lasts 60 seconds, so you have 33.33% uptime on that one ward, where your max is 3 wards, so 1/3rd uptime on 1/3rd of your wards equals 1/3rdx1/3rd=1/9th uptime on the max amount of vision you can have

after level 9, you get one 120 second ward every 120 seconds, so you can have 100% uptime on 1/3rd of your wards, or a total of 1x1/3rd or 1/3rd total up time.

Upgraded completely, you get one 180 second ward every 60 seconds, so if you use it you can have all three wards up at all times.

Also, the statistics I'm saying about the % of winning teams having more wards is totally based off my own history, and I never said under any circumstances that that information should be taken as universal, just that having such a strong trend is very noteworthy.

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9fbWjKOi,comment-id=0000000000010000000100000000,timestamp=2015-07-18T19:26:49.965+0000)

here is some basic math for you.

250 for upgraded trink= 0 damage
250 saved to add to 110 for longsword or 185 for amp tome=10 ad or 15 ap respectively

10ad or 15ap =1 snowball and 1 win

0 damage= 1 loss and 1 bronze 5 award

get the picture?

>10ad or 15ap =1 snowball and 1 win

>0 damage= 1 loss and 1 bronze 5 award

Here's a hint, pulling numbers out of your butt doesn't make you sound smarter, people double check numbers on these boards.  What you just posted is utter bs and you should be ashamed for stooping to that level just to try and troll someone.
I think the sad thing is, this guy actually believes he's right.

Or you know the ward can save you from a gank, you can go attack a enemy jungle because hes alone in your jungle or their jungle. Steal a buff when its up

Long term vs Short term thinking.

http://memeguy.com/photos/images/heard-we-were-doing-john-madden-quotes-53684.png

Not everyone plays enough ranked to be higher ranked.
I'm silver 4, but I've played a grand total of 17 ranked games this season.
But I'm mechanically better than most golds and know more about that game than a **LOT** of the community.
Rank *can* be an indicator of skill level/knowledge of the game, but not **always** skill=rank=knowledge.

TL;DR- If you've played 500 ranked games and are Bronze 3, you probably don't know much about the game. If you've played 11 ranked games and you're Bronze 5, it means you had a bad set of placements, and...nothing else.

It takes 6 games for a division, you can get to G4 in as little as 30 games, assumed no loss if you are as good as you claimed to be.

In a giant vacuum, the strength of your point of view relies on your credibility. I don't see the point of a beggar giving me financial 'advice' how to manage my money, and I will laugh if he attempts to advice the government how to 'improve' the economy. "I can be a millionaire, I just don't bother to" isn't a strong argument, if you are as good as you claimed, prove it with result, not excuse.

Assuming 100% win ratio for 30 games is....uh...pretty...unstatistically sound. Even Faker would have trouble reliably pulling that off, even at bronze.
And even assuming 30 straight wins, that's still 15 hours of gameplay *at least*.
I work full time+have a girlfriend+other responsibilities.

And I would listen to homeless person's advice about how to not become homeless. They learned the hard way. Laughing and ignoring them is increasing your likelihood repeating their bad decisions. + {{champion:43}}'s a bitch.

Heard a good quote a week or two back:

"If you're ahead, you can afford to upgrade your trinket. If you're behind, you can't afford to NOT upgrade it."

Gonna censor my thoughts on soraka as a champion.

> I *love* sightstone, but I feel like making the trinket upgrades free is just... unfair to the guys who can't farm. Ya know? You can last-hit 15ish minions for the upgrade, supports rely on their income item (and assists, if they can get their team snowballing).

Well,supports generally need to upgrade their trinket as well,so they will also benefit from this,I agree that the 400 gold for sightstone is a bit painful,but buffing it can quite easily force the jungler to buy it as well.

>but buffing it can quite easily force the jungler to buy it as well.

I disagree. Junglers, as of right now, sometimes take sightstone but usually just buy wards like everyone else (and if everyone else aren't buying wards, they *should* be!). If sightstone was buffed, it could be a competitive choice (the enemy jungler has sightstone, so I should get one too!) but I don't think junglers would be forced to. They farm and usually have more gold income than supports, so they don't always require the gold efficiency that sightstone gives.
